= '''Latest Code Revision Committed To The Repository''' =

[[PageOutline]]

== Newly committed source code to the trunk ==

Revisions targeted for the next official HIRLAM release, 7.1, have been checked into the HEAD version, available by checking out using, e.g, 
{{{
svn co https://svn.hirlam.org/trunk/
}}}
On ecmwf, the sandbox of the head version is updated daily in directory
{{{
/home/ms/dk/nhz/hirlam_release/trunk
}}}
and a daily updated tarball on
{{{
/scraych/ms/dk/nhz/head.tar.gz
}}}
The details of the changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/trunk/hirlam?&stop_rev=4571&verbose=on code browser]

== Newly committed experimental branch newsnow ==

A new code branch, newsnow, has been established, which is available by, e.g,
{{{ 
svn co https://svn.hirlam.org/branches/newsnow
}}}
On ecmwf, the sandbox of the branch is updated daily in directory
{{{
/home/ms/dk/nhz/hirlam_release/newsnow
}}}
and a daily updated tarball on
{{{
/scraych/ms/dk/nhz/newsnow.tar.gz 
}}}
The details of the changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/trunk/hirlam?&stop_rev=4571&verbose=on code browser]

== Bug fix version of the official release 7.0 ==

Bug fixes on the latest official release is now collected in the 'stable' hirlam-7-0 branch, available by checking out using, e.g,
{{{ 
svn co https://svn.hirlam.org/branch/hirlam-7.0
}}}
On ecmwf, the sandbox of the branch is updated daily in directory
{{{
/home/ms/dk/nhz/hirlam_release/7.0stableupd
}}}
and a daily updated tarball on
{{{
/scraych/ms/dk/nhz/7.0stableupd.tar.gz
}}}
The details of the changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/branches/newsnow/hirlam?action=stop_on_copy&rev=4620&stop_rev=&mode=follow_copy code browser]

== 7.1 alpha2-newsnow (released on 2006.11.08) ==

The 7.1 alpha2-newsnow is the latest update of the development code branch newsnow, which has been updated to be compatible with Hirlam 7.1 alpha2. It contains part of the code modifications between changeset [4507] to [4736]. The details of these changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/branches/newsnow/hirlam?action=follow_copy&rev=4736&stop_rev=4507&mode=follow_copy&verbose=on code browser]

== 7.1 alpha2 (released on 2006.11.08) ==

The 7.1 alpha2 is the second trial release of Hirlam 7.1. It contains part of the code modifications between changeset [4668] to [4730]. The details of these changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/trunk/hirlam?action=follow_copy&rev=4730&stop_rev=4668&mode=follow_copy&verbose=on code browser]

== 7.0.1 (released 2006.11.08) ==

The Hirlam-7.0.1 is a technical update to the official release Hirlam 7.0 with no meteorological impact. It contains part of the code modifications between changeset [4571] to [4725]. The details of these changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/branches/hirlam-7.0/hirlam action=stop_on_copy&rev=4725&stop_rev=4571&mode=stop_on_copy&verbose=on code browser]

== 7.1 alpha1 (released on 2006.09.27) ==

The 7.1 alpha1 is the first trial release of Hirlam 7.1. It contains code modifications from changeset [4573] to [4665]. The details of these changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/trunk/hirlam?action=stop_on_copy&rev=4665&stop_rev=4573&mode=stop_on_copy&verbose=on code browser]

== 7.0 (released 2006.05.02) ==

The 7.0 release, relative to 7.0rc1, contains code modifications for revisions [4566] to [4570]. The details of these changes can be found in the
[https://hirlam.org/trac/log/trunk/hirlam?action=stop_on_copy&rev=4566&stop_rev=4570&mode=stop_on_copy&verbose=on code browser]
